pageProduct.name: Otrivin Natural Nasal Spray Seawater & Eucalyptus 20 mL
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

General Information

Otrivin Natural Nasal Spray is an alternative to the Otrivin medicated range. It contains natural hypertonic seawater combined with essential oil of eucalyptus and extract of wild mint formulation that provides a natural relief from nasal congestion due to colds or rhinosinusitis.

Otrivin Natural Seawater & Eucalyptus contains, hypertonic seawater with eucalyptus essential oil and extract of wild mint. The solution also retains the richness of all the important minerals and microelements contained in seawater The concentration of salt in the sea water helps to reduce swelling.

Suitable For: 6 years +

Size: 20mL

Warnings

Where nasal irritation is present, transient tingling may occur during use.

CAUTION

If congestion persists for more than 10 days, consult your doctor or pharmacist.
For hygiene reasons, each spray should only be used by one person.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Do not use if carton pack seals are missing or broken.

Ingredients

Seawater (Hypertonic at 2.2% Sea Salt Concentration), Essential Oil of Eucalyptus Globulus, Extract of Mentha Arvensis.

Contains: Seawater

Directions

1. Blow your nose.
2. Shake the bottle before use.
3. Remove the protective cap.
4. Before first use, press applicator until an even spray is produced.
5. Hold the bottle upright with thumb under the base and with the nozzle between two fingers.
6. Lean your head forwards slightly and insert the nozzle into your nostril.
7. Spray while breathing in gently through your nose.
8. Repeat in the other nostril.
9. Allow the product to act for a few minutes. Do not blow your nose during this time.
10.Then blow your nose if needed.

USAGE ADVICE

HOW TO USE OTRIVIN NATURAL SEAWATER & EUCALYPTUS NASAL SPRAY:
1. Blow your nose.
2. Shake the bottle before use.
3. Remove the protective cap.
4. Before first use, press applicator until an even spray is produced. 5. Hold the bottle upright with thumb under the base and with the nozzle between two fingers.
6. Lean your head forwards slightly and insert the nozzle into your nostril.
7. Spray while breathing in gently through your nose.
8. Repeat in the other nostril.
9. Allow the product to act for a few minutes. Do not blow your nose during this time.
10.Then blow your nose if needed.

HOW OFTEN SHOULD I USE IT?
1 spray in each nostril up to 6 times daily.

WHO CAN USE IT?
Adults and children 6 years and over.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Do not use:
- In children under 6 years of age.
- If you are allergic to any of the ingredients.
- If you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

Ask your doctor before use:
If you've had a recent nasal operation or injury.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

After each use, wash the nozzle with hot water, dry it and put the protective cap back on.
Do not use the product after the expiry date or after 6 months of opening.
